channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Notebook and ThinkPad BIOS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Notebook and ThinkPad BIOS

item.title: CVE-2021-3786|2024-08-03T17:09:08.738Z -- lenovo -- notebook%20and%20thinkpad%20bios
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in CSME configuration of some Lenovo Notebook and ThinkPad systems could be used to leak out data out of the SMRAM range.
